source/include/boost/preprocessor/list/for_each_i.hpp

00012 #
00013 # /* See http://www.boost.org for most recent version. */
00014 #
00015 # ifndef BOOST_PREPROCESSOR_LIST_LIST_FOR_EACH_I_HPP
00016 # define BOOST_PREPROCESSOR_LIST_LIST_FOR_EACH_I_HPP
00017 #
00018 # include <boost/preprocessor/arithmetic/inc.hpp>
00019 # include <boost/preprocessor/config/config.hpp>
00020 # include <boost/preprocessor/list/adt.hpp>
00021 # include <boost/preprocessor/repetition/for.hpp>
00022 # include <boost/preprocessor/tuple/elem.hpp>
00023 # include <boost/preprocessor/tuple/rem.hpp>
00024 #
00025 # /* BOOST_PP_LIST_FOR_EACH_I */
00026 #
00027 # if ~BOOST_PP_CONFIG_FLAGS() & BOOST_PP_CONFIG_EDG() && ~BOOST_PP_CONFIG_FLAGS() & BOOST_PP_CONFIG_MSVC()
00028 #    define BOOST_PP_LIST_FOR_EACH_I(macro, data, list) BOOST_PP_FOR((macro, data, list, 0), BOOST_PP_LIST_FOR_EACH_I_P, BOOST_PP_LIST_FOR_EACH_I_O, BOOST_PP_LIST_FOR_EACH_I_M)
00029 # else
00030 #    define BOOST_PP_LIST_FOR_EACH_I(macro, data, list) BOOST_PP_LIST_FOR_EACH_I_I(macro, data, list)
00031 #    define BOOST_PP_LIST_FOR_EACH_I_I(macro, data, list) BOOST_PP_FOR((macro, data, list, 0), BOOST_PP_LIST_FOR_EACH_I_P, BOOST_PP_LIST_FOR_EACH_I_O, BOOST_PP_LIST_FOR_EACH_I_M)
00032 # endif
00033 #
00034 # if BOOST_PP_CONFIG_FLAGS() & BOOST_PP_CONFIG_STRICT()
00035 #    define BOOST_PP_LIST_FOR_EACH_I_P(r, x) BOOST_PP_LIST_FOR_EACH_I_P_D x
00036 #    define BOOST_PP_LIST_FOR_EACH_I_P_D(m, d, l, i) BOOST_PP_LIST_IS_CONS(l)
00037 # else
00038 #    define BOOST_PP_LIST_FOR_EACH_I_P(r, x) BOOST_PP_LIST_IS_CONS(BOOST_PP_TUPLE_ELEM(4, 2, x))
00039 # endif
00040 #
00041 # if ~BOOST_PP_CONFIG_FLAGS() & BOOST_PP_CONFIG_MWCC()
00042 #    define BOOST_PP_LIST_FOR_EACH_I_O(r, x) BOOST_PP_LIST_FOR_EACH_I_O_D x
00043 #    define BOOST_PP_LIST_FOR_EACH_I_O_D(m, d, l, i) (m, d, BOOST_PP_LIST_REST(l), BOOST_PP_INC(i))
00044 # else
00045 #    define BOOST_PP_LIST_FOR_EACH_I_O(r, x) (BOOST_PP_TUPLE_ELEM(4, 0, x), BOOST_PP_TUPLE_ELEM(4, 1, x), BOOST_PP_LIST_REST(BOOST_PP_TUPLE_ELEM(4, 2, x)), BOOST_PP_INC(BOOST_PP_TUPLE_ELEM(4, 3, x)))
00046 # endif
00047 #
00048 # if ~BOOST_PP_CONFIG_FLAGS() & BOOST_PP_CONFIG_EDG()
00049 #    define BOOST_PP_LIST_FOR_EACH_I_M(r, x) BOOST_PP_LIST_FOR_EACH_I_M_D(r, BOOST_PP_TUPLE_ELEM(4, 0, x), BOOST_PP_TUPLE_ELEM(4, 1, x), BOOST_PP_TUPLE_ELEM(4, 2, x), BOOST_PP_TUPLE_ELEM(4, 3, x))
00050 # else
00051 #    define BOOST_PP_LIST_FOR_EACH_I_M(r, x) BOOST_PP_LIST_FOR_EACH_I_M_I(r, BOOST_PP_TUPLE_REM_4 x)
00052 #    define BOOST_PP_LIST_FOR_EACH_I_M_I(r, x_e) BOOST_PP_LIST_FOR_EACH_I_M_D(r, x_e)
00053 # endif
00054 #
00055 # define BOOST_PP_LIST_FOR_EACH_I_M_D(r, m, d, l, i) m(r, d, i, BOOST_PP_LIST_FIRST(l))
00056 #
00057 # /* BOOST_PP_LIST_FOR_EACH_I_R */
00058 #
00059 # if ~BOOST_PP_CONFIG_FLAGS() & BOOST_PP_CONFIG_EDG()
00060 #    define BOOST_PP_LIST_FOR_EACH_I_R(r, macro, data, list) BOOST_PP_FOR_ ## r((macro, data, list, 0), BOOST_PP_LIST_FOR_EACH_I_P, BOOST_PP_LIST_FOR_EACH_I_O, BOOST_PP_LIST_FOR_EACH_I_M)
00061 # else
00062 #    define BOOST_PP_LIST_FOR_EACH_I_R(r, macro, data, list) BOOST_PP_LIST_FOR_EACH_I_R_I(r, macro, data, list)
00063 #    define BOOST_PP_LIST_FOR_EACH_I_R_I(r, macro, data, list) BOOST_PP_FOR_ ## r((macro, data, list, 0), BOOST_PP_LIST_FOR_EACH_I_P, BOOST_PP_LIST_FOR_EACH_I_O, BOOST_PP_LIST_FOR_EACH_I_M)
00064 # endif
00065 #
00066 # endif
